com.redhat.rhn.manager.ssm

Class SsmManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.redhat.rhn.manager.ssm.SsmManager

  • public class SsmManager
extends java.lang.Object
    The current plan for this class is to manage all SSM operations. However, as more is ported from perl to java, there may be a need to break this class into multiple managers to keep it from becoming unwieldly.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void addServersToSsm(User user, java.lang.String[] serverIds)
      Adds the selected server IDs to the SSM RhnSet.

      Clears the list of servers in the SSM.

    • Method Detail

      • performChannelActions

        public static void performChannelActions(User user,
                         java.util.Collection<ChannelActionDAO> sysMapping)
        Performs channel subscriptions. This method assumes the changes have been validated through:
        • #linkChannelsToSubscribeForServers(User, List, List)
        • #linkChannelsToUnsubscribeForServers(List, List)

        Furthermore, this call assumes the changes have been written to the necessary RhnSets via:

        • #populateSsmChannelServerSets(User, List)
        Parameters:
        user - user performing the action creations
        sysMapping - a collection of ChannelActionDAOs

      • addServersToSsm

        public static void addServersToSsm(User user,
                   java.lang.String[] serverIds)
        Adds the selected server IDs to the SSM RhnSet.
        Parameters:
        user - cannot be null
        serverIds - cannot be null

      • clearSsm

        public static void clearSsm(User user)
        Clears the list of servers in the SSM.
        Parameters:
        user - cannot be null

      • listServerIds

        public static java.util.List<java.lang.Long> listServerIds(User user)
        Returns a list of server-ids of the servers in the SSM selection, for the specified user
        Parameters:
        user - user whose system-set we care about
        Returns:
        list of server-ids
